name: Load Model
description: Load an existing, pre-traind neural network model from a checkpoint.

inputParameters.name: checkpoint_name
inputParameters.description: Name of the checkpoint file to load the model from, without the file extension. The file's extension must be *.ckpt.

inputParameters.name: checkpoint_path
inputParameters.description: Path to the directory containing the checkpoint file.

inputParameters.name: load
inputParameters.description: Set to True to load the model.
